FormFest 🧑‍💻

Sep 29, 2025

  • civictech
  • episode
  • government
  • design
  • accessibility
  • forms

We’re joined by Amanda Renteria CEO of Code for America. We dive into a conversation about what’s needed to make ‘good’ government forms and we let you know about a neat event coming up on 9/30/2025 called FormFest. Register for the event here: https://formfest.org/register/ .
